store_info.description_short: Create, Share, Collaborate, View your mind maps!
description_long: Wise Mapping is the web mind mapping open-source tool that leverages the power of Mind Maps mixing open standards technologies such as SVG and React. WiseMapping is based on the same code product supporting https://www.wisemapping.com.
hint: You need to login with user 'test@wisemapping.org' and password 'test'
Sharing and publishing features do not work yet
